scripts.start: node -e "console.log('open browser at http://localhost:8081/index.html\n\n');" && node node_modules/react-native/local-cli/cli.js start
scripts.prepublishOnly: mkdir -p dst; node node_modules/react-native/local-cli/cli.js bundle --entry-file src/index.js --platform vr --bundle-output dst/index.js --dev false
